Blacknightmare:

"Failsafes? what sort of Failsafes?"said Blacknightmare"what will 
happen if I win the IGL?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:


> The Bamphomet simulation thing stood there silent for a few moments 
> as data of the IGL from the various Infecticons on the planet 
entered 
> its mind. 
> 
> Bamphomet Sim thing: "The IGL... hmmm the program will allow you to 
> take part in the tournament. However upon your elimination you will 
> return here for your sentence to be completed. Failsafes shall be 
> installed into your system to make sure you do not think of running 
> after you have been eliminated from the tournament."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > Blacknightmare::
> > 
> > Blacknightmare continue fightting agaisnt his enemie (Sorry I've 
> > forget his name)"At last if this was the IGL"said the femme"this 
> will 
> > be a great battle..."
